title: Noam Chomsky Teaches Independent Thinking and the Media's Invisible Powers | Official Trailer
description:
Noam Chomsky is an icon of rebellion and intellectual dissent. According to The New York Times, the author of 150-plus books is “the most important intellectual alive today."

In his class, he shares valuable insights and powerful tools for facing the existential threat of media—including disinformation, AI, and the oppressive control of those in power.

Learn more about Noam Chomsky on MasterClass at https://mstr.cl/44y8N0S.

As the author of more than 150 books and one of the most cited people on Google Scholar, Noam Chomsky is an iconoclastic linguist who’s been speaking out against illegitimate uses of power since the 1960s. He won’t hand you any answers—but he will help you discover the truth for yourself. 
Lessons in this class include:

New Media: Information and Misinformation
Manufacturing Consent: The Control We Can’t See
Challenging the Status Quo: Noam and Linguistics
Turning Truth Into Activism
